name: Firepower test
description:
You control red, defeat the AI controlled blue forces.

Mouse to move units and mouse to attack enemies. You can attack up to 7 times with a single unit. However after every attack your chance to hit goes down and you have limited ammo so be wise about how much you shoot.

Inspired by Persona's 5 ranged weapon system.

Credits

Crooked Head's Turn Based Strategy Framework: https://www.assetstore.unity3d.com/en/#!/content/50282
